pullrequest.title: Add measurement unit to inspectors for Building Editor

content.raw: This looks good to me! I made a couple of changes which this pull request reminded me of on branch [issue_1363_louise](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/issue_1363_louise%0Dissue_1363#diff), feel free to merge it in with this pull request if you agree with the changes. It's just about adding `this->` to member variables and improving some ranges as we discussed the other day.
